content.question: Paragraphs 2 and 3 ("Early man ... his favor") compare early man's

choices.label: physical strength with modern man's intelligence and reason
lack of awareness with modern man's knowledge and understanding
basic skills with modern man's hunting prowess
wastefulness with modern man's conservation methods

content.answer: lack of awareness with modern man's knowledge and understanding

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
